alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 1:00PM PST until December 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches, with up to 10 inches above 6000 feet generally north of I-80. Snow levels 4500 feet. Wind gusts up to 45 mph over higher terrain. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slopes of the Northern Sierra Nevada including I-80 and Highway 50. * WHEN...Through 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times with gusty winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
